name: MEC Edge Rock Shoes - Unisex
description: Gain an edge on performance without sacrificing comfort. The MEC Edge climbing shoe is built on a flat last with a relaxed heel. It's great for emerging climbers looking for their first pair of shoes, or seasoned climbers needing an all-day option. The supportive midsole helps you edge and balance while you develop strength and technique, and the sticky Altum rubber lasts through long gym sessions.Microfibre upper is comfortable for all-day wear and won't stretch out.Dual strap closure give you a secure fit.Flat toe profile and slight asymmetry offers comfort for developing climbers.Stiff midsole supports feet on small footholds without compromising sensitivity.Altum rubber sole is designed for durability and grip on plastic or real rock.Members typically downsize 1.5-2 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size.
